## Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please make sure:

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guide
- [ ] Folder name is lowercase and hyphenated (e.g., `my-chain-name`)
- [ ] Both `chain.json` and `README.md` files are present
- [ ] JSON is properly formatted and valid
- [ ] All required fields are filled in:
  - [ ] `subnetId`
  - [ ] `network`
  - [ ] `categories`
  - [ ] `name`
  - [ ] `description`
  - [ ] `logo`
  - [ ] `website`
  - [ ] `socials`
  - [ ] `chains` array with complete blockchain info
- [ ] All URLs are valid and working
- [ ] Logo URL is accessible (HTTPS preferred)
- [ ] RPC endpoints are live (if provided)
- [ ] Social media links are correct
- [ ] I have permission to submit this information
- [ ] Information is accurate and up-to-date
